jump_scares.spoiler: A blue light appears in the fireplace out of nowhere and makes a loud sound
A glowing white figure appears in the camera, which startles Mike
A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
After Scarlett puts down the phone, a man’s voice starts talking from behind the group
Mole, the presumed dead friend of one of the group members, jumps at the group when approached by Souxie. [Video]
The ghost jumps again when further approached
Benji gets attacked by a lady
A sculpture on the wall breaks off and attacks the group
A hand reaches out of the water and grabs Scarlett
Scarlett lifts the sack on a hanging person’s head when that person jumps at her. [Video]
A dog runs towards Darrin
Darrin turns the camera and is startled by Raid
Darrin is startled by a water stream
A loud bang
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera quickly pans to show Peeping Tom’s feet stepping in front of Feldman
As Feldman looks up, Peeping Tom suddenly jumps up right in front of the camera
After Father Simon says “Now,” the camera pans to the left to show Alan being pulled out of a bathtub by someone and screaming
Alan is suddenly shot in the head
An apparent earthquake causes the camera to shake violently
The monster’s tail slams into the bridge
The monster’s foot comes down in front of Rob
An air-conditioning unit falls off the building
A parasite drops down from the ceiling
The monster suddenly lunges at the helicopter
A bomb hits while Rob and Beth are hiding under the bridge causing debris to cover the camera
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
As Ray clicks through the endlessly scrolling hallway, a ghost suddenly appears on screen
Ray’s camera turns back on and a scary face briefly flashes across the window
Rachel clicks the painting of the forest and it opens a video file, and a scary face immediately flashes in front of the camera in the video
The image of Amy with her face covered immediately shifts to reveal her face is distorted
There is a loud screech and the screen begins to glitch out

The image of Rachel and Amy begins to pop up all over the screen, then all of the images suddenly disappear off the screen to reveal Ray’s face looking very over-exposed and bleeding in front of the camera
Will turns on the camera light and a monster is standing right in front of him
There is suddenly a loud bang in the middle of a conversation
Adam grabs his boot from the grave and stands up to reveal Dekker standing right behind him
While Adam and Dekker are arguing, Will points the camera downwards and a monster runs straight at him
There is suddenly an incredibly loud screech that wakes up Adam and his wife
There is a loud explosion followed by another about 15 seconds later
A gunshot may startle some viewers
There is an explosion and sparks fly from up ahead in the tunnel
Holly screams loudly
There are several more explosions and sparks fly once more
There is an explosion and more sparks as Holly runs through the tunnel
One of the creatures appears in front of the camera
Two creatures appear behind Holly
A creature appears in front of Holly as she approaches J.P
Another creature appears as Holly opens a door
The door slams shut
There is a sudden loud noise and the camera goes fuzzy
Sasha’s hair gets lifted from behind
T.C. gets pushed down the stairs
A bed frame lifts off the ground
A girl runs through the hallway
The film crew approach a girl in the corner of a room when she spins around and screams
A hand breaks through the door behind Sasha and grabs her
Someone jumps out of a bath tub full of blood and drags in T.C
Lance finds a tongue in the corner of the room, looks up, and sees a ghost on the roof
A figure runs at Lance in the hallway
Lance spins around to see a group of doctors working on a patient. Suddenly one jumps up close to Lance and screams

movies.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abaddon Hotel

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement
The camera pans across to find one of the mannequins sitting at a table is now standing up facing the camera
A bloody woman with pale eyes appears in front of the camera. After holding on the shot for several seconds, the camera zooms in on her eyes
A clown mannequin’s arm and head moves
A door slams shut
A woman with pale eyes blinks, and a female screams
A wall suddenly explodes, revealing a red portal
The camera image glitches with an image of a clown’s face
A bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera
A man playing piano turns to reveal a bloody gash where his eye should be
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
After Marika begins to groan and enters some sort of trance, several birds slam into the window
After seeing some camera footage, Hori suddenly becomes very agitated
Some birds fly out at Kobayashi as he opens a sliding door
A sudden cut from a quiet scene where Kana is sleeping to an earlier scene where Hori is screaming may startle some viewers
An isopod crawls out of a fish
A swimmer is pulled under water
Accompanied by a high pitched screeching noise, the diver is attacked by an isopod
Donna screams as some blood falls on her
An apparently dead man’s eyeball suddenly moves
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers (this is followed by a second gunshot a few seconds later)
A car crashes into the mayor’s vehicle
Stephanie is about to start the cop car when a diseased person jumps up from the back seat and grabs her. [Video]
Aaron turns around after entering the cabin and sees several of the group members
A scary figure appears behind a boy. [Video]
Elizabeth suddenly jumps up in bed and screams as Damien touches her
Damien gets into his car and a masked man can be seen sitting in the back seat
A masked man appears behind Jenni and hits her head
There is a loud electronic noise as Elizabeth clicks on the link
Jenni, who is lying in a bathtub full of blood, suddenly begins to convulse as Elizabeth touches her. [Video]
A door bursts open and a masked man stands behind it
Elizabeth opens a door and finds the police officer chained up and dead
Elizabeth turns around and the masked man is right behind her
The masked man attacks Elizabeth once more
There is a loud metallic noise
Elizabeth sees a masked man standing in a dark hallway
Elizabeth runs around a corner and comes face to face with a masked man. [Video]
A vehicle collides with the car Elizabeth is driving
Various small scares for the next few seconds as actors scare the group
As the doll girl appears there is a sudden scream
Someone jumps out of the curtains as someone says “ashes
Mickey is scared by a man in a mask
A little girl comes out from the left side and then a few seconds later a man comes out of the wall directly in front of the camera
As the camera is facing the mirror there is a sudden cut
The lights come on and reveal a lot of clowns surrounding the vehicle
He is jumped by the doll girl
Mikey slams a hand against the window
A fully possessed Mink jumps at the camera and screams
Mink is standing in the filed before attacking the crew
Mink pulls out a knife and attacks
A possessed person jumps out in front of the cameraman
One of the workers appears in front of the camera
A sphinx creature runs across the screen while shrieking
A large brick falls on Zahir after he says “What the hell is wrong with you, man?
The sphinx runs across the screen again
The Anubis appears out of the hole and begins to pull the soldier in
The large hanging brick that Holden is investigating falls down
Holden is impaled by the Anubis after he says “We have to keep going.
The Anubis quickly turns toward the camera
The Anubis walks around the corner while growling
Fitzie places his hand over Nora’s mouth
As the camera’s light comes back on the Anubis jumps towards it
The Anubis jumps out of the hole and grabs Nora
After Nora calls out to Fitzie the Anubis crushes his face
As the boy turns around The Anubis jumps at him
Luis spins the camera back around and Deborah is suddenly standing right in front of him
A door slams
Sarah suddenly appears in the room and begins talking to Deborah
Deborah screams into the camera
Deborah suddenly attacks Sarah
Deborah suddenly appears in front of Luis. [Video
A phone rings loudly
A door slams shut
A loud noise startles the group
A loud bang comes from outside followed by several more over the next few seconds
A loud bang startles the group
The television suddenly comes off its stand and slams into Harris
A snake crawls out of the bag
A face can briefly be seen in the window
Deborah suddenly bites the security guard on the neck
Deborah spits at one of the police officers
A window breaks in front of Sarah and Mia
Sarah slowly approaches Deborah in an attempt to sedate her, however Deborah spins around and attacks her. [Video
Deborah opens her mouth in a horribly contorted manner and roars at Sarah
Doris crawls around the corner and snarls at Tyler
Doris runs past the door as Tyler looks out
Rebecca bursts through a door to scare Tyler
Doris pops up in front of the camera and snarls
Doris bangs hard on the children’s bedroom door
Doris bangs on the window
Doris appears in front of the camera
Doris’s hand comes up from underneath the bed and she laughs maniacally
Loud music begins to play after AJ says “I just got these new speakers”
During the “Agatha” movie, there is a loud metallic noise as a girl is restrained by chains as she tries to escape
After blacking out, the camera footage comes back on and an intruder is now standing right behind Kelly
A door opens loudly behind AJ
There is a loud bang on the door of AJ’s house
After the results of the poll show Matias is to die, a van suddenly collides with him. (An alternative ending exists that lacks this jump scare with Matias instead being buried alive)
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
Loud noise from silence as a man plugs in a microphone
A raccoon makes a noise
Something hits the side of Kelly & Jim’s tent
Something hits the side of Kelly and Jim’s tent
Something crashes down in the forest behind Kelly
Something jumps from behind a bush at Kelly
Something makes a noise in the forest behind Kelly and Jim
Something breaks a stick in the forest near the characters
Naked woman appears moaning
Something drags camera away from frame
